main event: Civilians reported seeing an unidentified flying object with a greenish light around the outer edge and a red light in the center, hovering above the ground and then rapidly shooting straight up and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was approximately 60 to 100 feet in diameter and hovered about 50 to 100 feet above the ground.
The object was revolving or rotating very slowly.
The witnesses were very frightened and ran inside their house after seeing the object.
The police investigated the incident and questioned the witnesses, including a 15-year-old boy who saw the object and heard a sound like a 'space ship'.
The police planned to question the entire neighborhood and provide a report on the incident.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with a greenish light around the outer edge and a red light in the center
witnesses: adult male, adult male juvenile (son of complainant)
